note.p: Birth: Bandon, County Cork, Ireland (20 December 1841)
Death: His residence, 148 High Street, Burton-on-Trent, Staffordshire (08 January 1907)
Burial: Near Bandon, County Cork, Ireland
Education: Royal School of Mines, London

Career: Assistant to A W von Hofmann (FRS 1851), Royal College of Chemistry; Assistant Brewer and Chemist to Messrs Bass, Ratcliffe, and Gretton (Bass & Co Brewers); Head of Scientific and Analytical Staff, Bass; published researches in the chemistry of brewing and fermentation
